name: FireEye HX
description: Polarity's FireEye HX integration allows querying for Alerts, Associated Hosts, and Policy data using Hashes.

options.name: FireEye HX Instance URL
options.description: The URL of the FireEye HX instance you would like to connect to (including http:// or https://)

options.name: FireEye HX API Token
options.description: The API Token associated with the FireEye HX account.

options.name: Max Concurrent Requests
options.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests.  Integration must be restarted after changing this option. Defaults to 20.

options.name: Minimum Time Between Lookups
options.description: Minimum amount of time in milliseconds between lookups. Integration must be restarted after changing this option. Defaults to 100.
